about_the_game:
Sex and the Furry Titty goes to town on the city! There are foxy ladies out and about, hung plumbers visiting some wet and wild kitties, gloryholes waiting for the connoisseurs, and much, much more!



Six all-new, original stories, one starts with a leaky sink, another with a jaunt to a lingerie shop. An encounter in the library brings two college students together, and a pair of newlyweds are trying to see all the sights, but can’t take their eyes off one another. Every time it starts with something innocent enough, but upgrades to a steamy hot (and sometimes public!) sex soon after.



Robyn is a polyamorous sex blogger who really likes being with people, but right now she is stuck at home all alone, longing for some action. But there's a package heading to her, full of wondrous treasures, shiny and vibrating. And even if her partners can't be with her physically, she can call someone while she's testing her new toys!


A very foxy lady walks into a boutique to get some new sexy lingerie. There’s only one assistant available, he’s new and extremely nervous. But he is just so, so adorable! She must have him. The lady licks her lips, imagining the taste of his meat: The game of fox and mouse is about to begin!


The faucet bursts, making Mindy one wet and furious kitty. One call, and the plumber knocks on her door. Just gets one glimpse of the guy, and she becomes much, much wetter. There are a few ways to fix the leak, and now the kitty really wants her pipes cleaned, too. Luckily, there’s a mighty plunger at hand.


A shy, nerdy tigress sits in the library. She imagines a boy giving her flowers, kissing her, marrying her, fucking her brains out. And then the boy in question walks up to her to ask for some help with Eng Lit. Startled, she drops her books, and when they pick them up, their eyes meet, and a spark ignites a fierce fire. There are lots of nooks between the bookshelves, but maybe they can wait till evening?


IT’S TIME TO PARTY! The music pumps, the crowd goes wild in the trendy club, promising an amazing night! And here’s a lithe deer lady, who needs to freshen up in the powder room. But there’s only one stall available, and there are two holes cut out of the both sidewalls. Have you heard a saying, "Grab the deer by the horns?” No? Anyway, she’s going to get some.


The newlywed couple went to Japan for their honeymoon. There are so many cool places! The sights! The only problem is they are still so horny, everywhere they go, they end up fucking. Trains, Ferris wheels, public baths and even restaurants, no place is safe from this wild bunch!

Features

  • Five steaming hot stories, one better than the other
  • More than 60 fully original artworks
  • Hand-animated VOICED sex scenes that will leave you wanting more
  • Branching narrative, choices, and decisions (because sex is always exciting in many ways)
  • Classic Match-3 gameplay to add some casual fun

short_description: Sex and the Furry Titty goes to town on the city! Experience 6 new stories with an elaborate web of branching paths. Explore each one, win match-3 challenges, and get ready for 24 hot animated VOICED sex scenes!
